name: GBot
body:
### Welcome to GBot

##GBot stands for Gerry's Bot Generic, Educational, Recreational and Radical Yoghurt's Bot
The name means absolutely nothing but it sounds cool.

If you want to clone the repository for GBot then just do:
```
$ git clone https://github.com/TheWarpDimension/gbot.git
```
Or if you want to get the latest version:
```
$ wget (TO BE DONE WHEN 1ST SUCCESSFUL BUILD IS COMPLETED)
```

### FAQ

Q: Why did you chose that name?
A: I didn't Boncey did! Blame him -JustHev
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
